info.name: † The Sims Resource Advertisement Remover †
info.description:
Removes advertisements on The Sims Resource.
PLEASE NOTE: The Sims Resource has hundreds of advertisement entries and new ones will often pop up. I will be frequently updating this script when that happens.
──↝⊰ ∙✦∙ ⊱↜──
HD Preview
info.additionalInfo: Version 1.0 Change Log: 21/06/2017 // Created. 24/07/2017 // Added coding to remove more advertisements. 26/07/2017 // Tidied up coding and updated credit to new username.
